label: lem-total-squared-error-unstable
name: Let $\mathcal{S}_1$ and $\mathcal{S}_2$ be two swarm states
relations_established: Total squared error from unstable walkers bounded by status changes
natural_language_statement: Let $\mathcal{S}_1$ and $\mathcal{S}_2$ be two swarm states. The total squared error in the expected raw distance from the set of unstable walkers, $\mathcal{A}_{\text{unstable}}$, is bounded by the total number of status changes:
full_statement_text: Let $\mathcal{S}_1$ and $\mathcal{S}_2$ be two swarm states. The total squared error in the expected raw distance from the set of unstable walkers, $\mathcal{A}_{\text{unstable}}$, is bounded by the total number of status changes:
